title: what this is?
body: I have an error when starting a game and it does not allow me to reconnect please urgent help, I end up going to afk for not being able to reconnect

replies.body: Likely a problem related to content discussed in [this](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/sB4ucqXc-game-client-anti-cheat-changes-going-live) thread.  I recommend reading through that and posting there if you continue to have problems.
